CustomField.description: Which day of the week this record represents.
CustomField.formula: IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Shift_Allocation' , CASE( IF ( WEEKDAY ( tc9_pr__Work_Schedule__r.tc9_pr__Work_Schedule_Start_Date__c ) + ( tc9_pr__Day_Number__c -1) >7, WEEKDAY ( tc9_pr__Work_Schedule__r.tc9_pr__Work_Schedule_Start_Date__c ) +( tc9_pr__Day_Number__c -1) - 7 , WEEKDAY ( tc9_pr__Work_Schedule__r.tc9_pr__Work_Schedule_Start_Date__c ) + ( tc9_pr__Day_Number__c -1)) , 1,"Sunday", 2,"Monday", 3,"Tuesday", 4,"Wednesday", 5,"Thursday", 6,"Friday", "Saturday"), IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Work_Schedule_Entry', CASE (WEEKDAY(tc9_pr__Entry_Date__c), 1,"Sunday", 2,"Monday", 3,"Tuesday", 4,"Wednesday", 5,"Thursday", 6,"Friday", "Saturday") ,"") )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Which day of the week this record represents.
CustomField.label: Day of the Week
